If you see this fragment it means that you are uncool. Our condolences! But you still can proceed further (or try to realise your coolness).
No matter your coolness, you have been permitted to access this top-secret data.
SecondActivity
Hello Square World!
Hello blank fragment
The strongest muscle in the body is the tongue.
There are only two words in the English language that have all five vowels in order: abstemious and facetious.
Coca-Cola was originally green.
The name of all the continents end with the same letter that they start with.
Women blink nearly twice as much as men!
A snail can sleep for three years.
On average, people fear spiders more than they do death.
The cigarette lighter was invented before the match.
Most lipstick contains fish scales.
Hair and nails grow faster during pregnancy.
Your nostrils work one at a time.
Riding a roller coaster could help you pass a kidney stone.
Sea lions can dance to a beat.
For 100 years, maps have shown an island that doesn\'t exist (see Sandy Island, AUS for more).
Napoleon was once attacked by thousands of rabbits.
Pigs are constitutionally protected in Florida.
Sharks can live for five centuries.
Saudi Arabia imports camels from Australia.
America\'s first bank robber deposited the money back into the same bank.
Sharks existed before trees.
Nine-banded armadillos always have quadruplets, and they’re always identical.
Dolphins give names to each other.
A group of owls is called a parliament.
French Poodles are actually from Germany.
Pilots and their co-pilots are required to eat different meals before flights so that they don’t both end up with food poisoning.
While listening to music, your heart can sync to the rhythm.
Monaco’s orchestra is bigger than its army.
Tomatoes have more genes than humans.
Here\'s an interesting fact: Pope Gregory IV once declared war on cats because he believed Satan used black cats. His declaration lead to the mass extermination of cats.
Your cat probably doesn\'t love you
Cats are an environmental disaster
Your cat might be driving you crazy
\" If you are alone with your cat and you die, he will eat you immediately\"
